content: a knitting pattern and a recipe for a modern ribbed hat with 2 alternative ways to shape the crown there s a video available so you can knit along and follow all steps **included in the pattern ** * pdf with altogether 13 pages * very detailed step-by-step written instructions * tons of pictures and helpful tips * video tutorials for all knitting techniques are available on my blog **difficulty ** beginner+ this ribbed hat pattern is knit in the round - either using circular needles and the magic loop technique or double-pointed knitting needles it doesn t feature any complicated stitches and is very straightforward to knit apart from detailed tutorials for all involved techniques the pattern lists every single step in great detail and gives you tons of further options **yarn and yardage ** the basic pattern is knit with a solid 2-ply yarn that runs for 250m per 100gram so between dk & worsted as the instructions tell you exactly how to determine your cast-on requirements in case you are using a different yarn you can finish it with any other yarn weight from sport to worsted provided you are fine with doing some veeeery simple math **skills required ** knit purl ssk k2tog optional tubular cast-on **additional materials ** - tapestry needle - scissors - 5 stitch marker
